headline: Danaher Stock Has Fallen Far Enough. Buy It Now, Says Analyst.
summary: FEATURE   Danaher stock gained after picking up a bullish call from Wall Street.  Valuation normalization is the reason, and after a painful few months, the stock looks attractive again.  Shares of the life-sciences company rose 3.

headline: Honeywell's Planned Spinoff And What It Means Amid Macro Volatility
summary: After a slew of generally successful spinoffs elsewhere in the market, Honeywell looks to split into three units. Read more here.
